item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 15, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How to Lead Your Team When the House Is on Fire (92 points | 44 comments)
2. Paraguay Loves Mickey, the Cartoon Mouse. Disney Doesn't (34 points | 13 comments)
3. g1: Using Llama-3.1 70B on Groq to create o1-like reasoning chains (37 points | 11 comments)

10. Bitcoin puzzle #66 was solved: 6.6 BTC (~$400k) withdrawn (176 points | 161 comments)
11. Data Engineering Vault: A 1000 Node Second Brain for DE Knowledge (53 points | 4 comments)

13. The disunity of consciousness in everyday experience (137 points | 90 comments)
14. How Foundries Calculate Die Yield (27 points | 1 comment)

21. USPS' long-awaited new mail truck makes its debut to rave reviews from carriers (171 points | 255 comments)
22. Bluesky Reaches 10M Accounts (91 points | 34 comments)
23. Ask HN: Former gifted children with hard lives, how did you turn out? (132 points | 83 comments)
24. Adapter lets you use cheap eSIM plans on any Android phone (19 points | 10 comments)
25. Throwable tactical camera transmits 360° panoramic thermal images (63 points | 40 comments)
26. Linux dev swatted and handcuffed live during a development video stream (139 points | 79 comments)
27. The art of niwaki (Japanese tree pruning) (2017) (83 points | 15 comments)
28. Pico-ASHA: USB audio to ASHA adapter (15 points | 3 comments)
29. The Death of the Magazine (66 points | 63 comments)
30. Linux 6.11 Released (241 points | 89 comments)
